mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "From the Floor", "Square Dance Datebook", "On the Record", "As I See It", "A New Approach to Square Dance Coverage", "So You're Going to Start a Basic Program of American Square Dancing", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Madeline Allen on the Care and Feeding of Guest Callers", "Homes for Square Dancing", "Style Series: Lines Walk In", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Workshop", "National Convention", "Caller of the Month: Lee Kopman", "Paging the Round Dancers: Bill and Pauline Stapp", "Current Best Sellers", and "Feature Fashion".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
